DOC.brief_summary: This study assess administration loop diuretic , specifically furosemide , achieve euvolemia safely reduce length stay follow colorectal surgery .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria All elective colorectal surgery ( CRS ) utilize enhanced recovery pathway ( ERP ) The surgery involve resection Exclusion Criteria Exclusion Criteria Randomization : Surgeries involve intraoperative radiation Ileostomy closure , perform surgical intervention Surgeries involve multiple discipline ( e.g. , colorectal plus general surgery , colorectal plus gynecology surgery ) except colorectal surgery plus ureteral stent placement . Chronic loop diuretic therapy ( i.e. , bumetanide , torsemide , furosemide , ethacrynic acid ) include need administration therapy Patients receive dialysis Creatinine clearance , calculate CockcroftGault equation , less 30 mL/min . Inpatient prior surgery Allergy furosemide Allergy sulfa drug allergy involve anaphylactic reaction Lack serum creatinine concentration within 3 month precede surgery AND diagnosis chronic kidney disease Exclusion Criteria Intervention ( applies intervention control arm ) : Patient 's weight POD # 1 POD # 2 less preoperative weight . Blood pressure criterion : systolic blood pressure criterion less 90 mmHg great 30 mmHg baseline POD # 1 and/or POD # 2 immediately prior administration study drug . Complications within 48 hour surgery Abscess ( infect fluid collection , treat CT drainage ) Leak ( define CT drainage reoperation ) Wound infection ( treat either antibiotic and/or open packing ) Bowel obstruction ( treated reoperation ) Reoperation Hemorrhage Weight change since admission POD # 1 : > 5 kg Acute kidney injury POD # 1 POD # 2 define SCr increase ≥ 0.3 mg/dL increase ≥ 150 % 200 % ( 1.5 2fold ) baseline
